author: Techlore
description:
Tired of Gmail's ads, data mining, and Big Tech influence? In this video, I dive into the top 5 best Gmail alternatives that prioritize your privacy, control, and overall email experience. I’ll also cover 3 honorable mentions worth considering. I use multiple criteria from cost to security to features to give you a list with lots of variety to help you on your journey.

Thank you to our sponsor Notesnook! They offer E2EE notes in an open source ecosystem, free to try. Visit their site to get started: https://notesnook.com

title: Gmail Alternatives: 5 Options to Escape Big Tech
